## IGifOptions.FrameSize property

Gets or sets frame size.

```csharp
public Size FrameSize { get; set; }
```

## Remarks

If the size is empty then the value will be taken from [`SlideSize`](../../../aspose.slides/ipresentation/slidesize)&gt;
